title: The Star News advertises that customers will receive their paper by 6 AM Monday thre Friday and by 7 AM Saturday and Sunday.  Anymore, (in the last 6 months), I usually get mine around 6:30 to 7 during the week and Saturdays it\'s around 7:30 and Sunday it can be anytime between 7:30, (very seldom), and 8:20. Am I wrong on delivery times?
text:
For delivery questions and complaints, you can call our Circulation
Department at 343-2391.
